altername_name: Sega Saturn de Hakken!! Tamagocchi Park
name: Sega Saturn de Hakken!! Tamagotchi Park
overview: Sega Saturn de Hakken!!: Tamagotchi Park is a Tamagotchi game for the SEGA Saturn. The player can raise Tamagotchis. It is compatible with Saturn Backup Memory cartridge. The game features some SEGA characters, such as Sonic the Hedgehog as a Tamagotchi.
